title: Print Hello
question: Write a Python program that prints 'Hello, World!'

title: Add Two Numbers
question: Write a Python program to add two numbers 5 and 7 and print the result.

title: Input and Output
question: Take user's name as input and print 'Hello, <name>!'

title: Check Even or Odd
question: Write a program to check if a number (input from user) is even or odd.

title: Sum of List
question: Write a program that calculates the sum of numbers in a list [1, 2, 3, 4, 5].

title: Reverse a String
question: Write a program that takes a string input and prints it in reverse.

title: Factorial of a Number
question: Write a program that takes a number as input and prints its factorial.

title: Fibonacci Sequence
question: Print the first 5 numbers of the Fibonacci sequence starting from 0.

title: List Comprehension
question: Use list comprehension to create a list of squares from 1 to 5.

title: Count Vowels
question: Write a program to count the number of vowels in the input string.

title: Swap Variables
question: Write a program to swap two variables a and b with values 3 and 5.

title: Check Palindrome
question: Write a Python program to check if a given string is a palindrome.

title: Simple Calculator
question: Write a program to perform addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division on two numbers input by the user.

title: Check Prime
question: Write a program to check if a number is prime.

title: Find Largest Number
question: Write a program to find the largest number in a list [10, 25, 3, 56, 14].

title: List to Dictionary
question: Convert two lists ['a', 'b', 'c'] and [1, 2, 3] into a dictionary using a loop.

title: Read File and Count Words
question: Write a Python program that reads a text file and counts the total number of words.

title: Class: Circle Area
question: Create a class `Circle` with a method that returns the area given the radius.

title: Count Character Frequency
question: Write a Python program to count the frequency of each character in a string.

title: Sort Dictionary by Value
question: Write a program to sort a dictionary by its values in descending order.

title: Decorator: Timing Function
question: Write a decorator to measure the execution time of a function.

title: Lambda with Filter
question: Use lambda and filter to get even numbers from a list [1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6].

title: File Line Reverser
question: Write a program to reverse the lines of a text file and save it into a new file.
sample_output: Lines reversed and written to output.txt

title: Recursive Sum
question: Write a recursive function that returns the sum of numbers from 1 to n.

title: Check Anagram
question: Write a function to check if two strings are anagrams of each other.

title: Custom Iterator Class
question: Create a custom iterator class `EvenNumbers` that yields even numbers up to a given limit.

title: Multithreading Example
question: Write a Python program that creates two threads to print numbers from 1 to 10 and A to J concurrently.

title: Context Manager for File Timer
question: Write a custom context manager using a class that logs the execution time of a code block to a file.

title: API Data Fetch and Parse
question: Write a program that fetches JSON data from a public API (e.g., https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/users) and prints the names and emails.

title: Metaclass to Track Class Creation
question: Create a metaclass that prints a message every time a new class is created using it.
sample_output: Class TrackedClass was created using MetaLogger
